shortcv.p: B.Sc., Athens University of Economics and Business; Ph.D., Warwick Business School, University of Warwick

Dr. Mylonopoulos has teaching and research interests in the areas of Information Systems Management, Electronic Business and Mobile Commerce. He is currently Assistant Professsor of Information Systems in the Athens Laboratory of Business Administration (ALBA). He has taught at Loughborough University Business School, Warwick Business School, Birkbeck College (University of London), Bordeaux School of Management and the Athens University of Economics and Business. Since 2001 he is Visiting Professor of Electronic Business at the Bordeaux School of Management, France.
For more information please visit his personal web page.
